name: INRideStatus
desc: The status of a ride booked through a ride-booking service.

items.name: var rideIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The unique string that you use to identify the ride.

items.name: var phase: INRidePhase
items.desc: The current status of the ride.

items.name: enum INRidePhase
items.desc: Constants indicating the current ride status.

items.name: var completionStatus: INRideCompletionStatus?
items.desc: Information about how the ride ended.

items.name: var vehicle: INRideVehicle?
items.desc: The vehicle assigned to pick up the user.

items.name: var rideOption: INRideOption?
items.desc: Information about the type of ride that you are offering to the user.

items.name: var scheduledPickupTime: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The scheduled pickup time for the user.

items.name: var estimatedPickupDate: Date?
items.desc: The estimated pickup time for the ride.

items.name: var estimatedPickupEndDate: Date?
items.desc: The date after which the driver may stop waiting for the user.

items.name: var estimatedDropOffDate: Date?
items.desc: The estimated drop-off time for the ride.

items.name: var pickupLocation: CLPlacemark?
items.desc: The starting location for the ride.

items.name: var waypoints: [CLPlacemark]?
items.desc: The intermediate waypoints for the journey.

items.name: var userActivityForCancelingInApplication: NSUserActivity?
items.desc: A user activity object for canceling the ride request.

items.name: var additionalActionActivities: [NSUserActivity]?
items.desc: Additional activities that the user may choose to perform while the ride request is active.
